SELECT LOLID, NICKNAME, TEAMGAMESEQ, USERID, TITLE, MATCHMODE, MESSAGE, POSITIONSEQ, STATUS, LEADER, MIKE, USEPOINT, INDATE, INUSERID, MODDATE, UPUSERID, POSISEQ, TOP, JUN, MID, BOT, SUP FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, TEAMGAME_QUERY.* FROM ( SELECT LOL_ID AS LOLID, NICK_NAME AS NICKNAME, TEAMGAME_SEQ AS TEAMGAMESEQ, BROWNIE_USER.USER_ID AS USERID, TITLE AS TITLE, MATCH_MODE AS MATCHMODE, MESSAGE AS MESSAGE, TEAMGAME.POSITION_SEQ AS POSITIONSEQ, TEAMGAME.STATUS AS STATUS, TEAMGAME.LEADER AS LEADER, MIKE AS MIKE, USE_POINT AS USEPOINT, TEAMGAME.IN_DATE AS INDATE, TEAMGAME.IN_USER_ID AS INUSERID, TEAMGAME.UP_DATE AS MODDATE, TEAMGAME.UP_USER_ID AS UPUSERID, TEAMGAME_POSITION.POSITION_SEQ AS POSISEQ, TOP AS TOP, JUN AS JUN, MID AS MID, BOT AS BOT, SUP AS SUP FROM (SELECT * FROM TEAMGAME WHERE UPPER(LEADER) = 'Y' AND UPPER(STATUS) = 'Y' ) TEAMGAME INNER JOIN BROWNIE_USER ON TEAMGAME.USER_ID = BROWNIE_USER.USER_ID INNER JOIN TEAMGAME_POSITION ON TEAMGAME.POSITION_SEQ = TEAMGAME_POSITION.POSITION_SEQ
AND LOWER(TITLE) LIKE LOWER('%'||#{searchRoomTitle}||'%')
AND match_Mode = #{searchGameType}
AND UPPER(TOP) = 'N'
AND UPPER(JUN) = 'N'
AND UPPER(MID) = 'N'
AND UPPER(BOT) = 'N'
AND UPPER(SUP) = 'N'
ORDER BY USE_POINT DESC, TEAMGAME.IN_DATE DESC ) TEAMGAME_QUERY ) WHERE ${startPost} <= RN AND RN <= ${endPost}

SELECT TG.TEAMGAME_SEQ as teamGameSeq , TP.POSITION_SEQ as positionSeq , TP.TOP as top , TP.MID as mid , TP.JUN as jun , TP.BOT as bot , TP.SUP as sup FROM TEAMGAME_POSITION TP, TEAMGAME TG WHERE TG.POSITION_SEQ = TP.POSITION_SEQ and TP.POSITION_SEQ = #{positionSeq} and rownum = 1
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO TEAMGAME USING DUAL ON( TEAMGAME_SEQ = #{teamGameSeq} AND USER_ID = #{userId} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET STATUS = 'y', POSITION = #{position} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( TEAMGAME_SEQ , USER_ID , POSITION_SEQ , POSITION , STATUS , IN_DATE , IN_USER_ID , UP_DATE , UP_USER_ID) VALUES ( #{teamGameSeq} , #{userId} , #{positionSeq} , #{position} , 'y' , SYSDATE , #{userId} , SYSDATE , #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT TG.TEAMGAME_SEQ as teamGameSeq , TG.USER_ID as userId , BU.lol_id as lolId , BU.nick_name as nickName , TG.TITLE as title , TG.MATCH_MODE as matchMode , TG.MESSAGE as message , TG.POSITION_SEQ as positionSeq , TG.STATUS as status , TG.IN_DATE as inDate , TG.IN_USER_ID as inUserId , TG.UP_DATE as modDate , TG.UP_USER_ID as upUserId , TG.USE_POINT as usePoint , TG.LEADER as leader , TG.MIKE as mike , TG.POSITION as position FROM TEAMGAME tg, brownie_user bu WHERE TG.user_id = BU.user_id AND TG.TEAMGAME_SEQ = #{teamGameSeq} AND TG.USER_ID = #{userId}

select TEAMGAME_SEQ as teamGameSeq , USER_ID as userId , TITLE as title , MATCH_MODE as matchMode , MESSAGE as message , POSITION_SEQ as positionSeq , STATUS as status , IN_DATE as inDate , IN_USER_ID as inUserId , UP_DATE as modDate , UP_USER_ID as upUserId , USE_POINT as usePoint , LEADER as leader , MIKE as mike , POSITION as position from TEAMGAME where TEAMGAME_SEQ = #{teamGameSeq} and LEADER = 'y'

SELECT TG.TEAMGAME_SEQ AS teamGameSeq ,TG.USER_ID AS userId ,BU.LOL_ID AS lolId ,BU.NICK_NAME AS nickName ,TG.STATUS AS status ,TG.LEADER AS leader ,TG.MIKE AS mike ,TG.POSITION AS position FROM BROWNIE_USER BU, TEAMGAME TG WHERE BU.USER_ID = TG.USER_ID AND TG.STATUS = 'y' AND TG.TEAMGAME_SEQ = #{teamGameSeq}
